content: handmade socks are one of life s true luxuries it s heavenly to wear a pair of socks made just to your own size specifications that are handcrafted from soft and luxurious yarns like alpaca and cashmere it s one of the best things about being a yarncrafter socks are also the perfect project to work on in warm weather or when traveling because they re small easy to manage and wonderfully portable the furrow socks pattern with its ribs reminiscent of the rolling row of a landscape full of freshly plowed fields in the spring provides the stretch needed for a crocheted sock s easy fit a satisfying texure that feels great on the soles and timeless style * skill level advanced beginner should be comfortable working in the round * yarn 400-450 yards fingering/sock weight yarn preferably a variety of superwash wool variegated yarns work as well as tonal and solid varieties * hook 3 5 mm/e hook or hook needed to obtain gauge * size range adult x-small 7 5 bridge small 8 25 bridge medium 9 bridge large 9 75 bridge x-large 10 5 bridge * notions 2 locking stitch markers in different colors tapestry needle for finishing * gauge 4 single_crochet = 75 in toe section
